title: Effect of Wuzhi Capsule (WZC) on the Pharmacokinetics of Tacrolimus in Renal Transplantation Recipients.
abstract: Previous studies have shown that WZC can increase tacrolimus blood concentration when co-administered. However, limited knowledge exists regarding the pharmacokinetics of both tacrolimus and the bioactive lignans in WZC when administered simultaneously in renal transplantation patients.
